events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't been delivered. The tracking information hasn't updated and I'm very concerned about the delay.
The issue reported by the customer contains keywords indicating a delivery delay.
Support agent Jessica M. has been assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay complaint.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your order delivery issue and will do my best to resolve it quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipment status?
My order number is 1234567890 and the last tracking update was a week ago saying the package was in transit but no further updates since.
I have contacted the shipping carrier with your tracking information and escalated your case. We expect a status update within 48 hours and will notify you immediately.
Thank you for the quick response and for escalating this. I appreciate your help in resolving this delay.
The package was located by the carrier and is out for delivery today. Your order should arrive by the end of the day.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory after the delivery delay.
Yes, I received the package yesterday. It arrived in good condition and Iâ€™m happy with how you handled the delay. Thanks again!
The support case for the delivery delay has been closed following customer confirmation of order receipt and satisfaction.
A customer satisfaction survey was sent to collect feedback on the support experience regarding the delivery delay issue.
